body: It's been 3 years since this was uploaded. this isn't going to get translated is it? after so long? i don't see that happening. such a shame. and here i was looking forward to reading this. sigh.

why are the tags in English and everything else is in English but most of the mangas are all in chinese or japanese? wtf is wrong with your website?  o.O    there is no logic to the layout at all...   it fucking sucks...   :-/
